title: Laser Glow Headphones - What Magic Is This?
description: (   ) --- Today's Mystery Video -   These earbuds / earphones / headphones are some of the coolest I've seen. The glow or pulsate to the beat of the music using Corning fibre optics. The Glow are an in-ear style headphone with an ear hook, making them a good choice for jogging, biking etc. The Glow are not just a gimmick as the pulsating light can make an individual substantially more visible (to cars etc.) when out at night.    From the manufacturer -  Premium sound with ultimate expression.  Glow lights up with vibrant laser technology that pulsates to your favorite music. Use the Glow App for iOS or Android to control the laser intensity, so you can go bold or subtle depending on your mood.  Beautiful and brilliant, Glow is the only headphone illuminated by Fibrance light diffusing fiber designed by Corning to conduct pure, radiant laser light that pulses to your music.   The intuitive touch button design lets you respond to texts, snap pictures and use voice commands to stay connected like no other headphone.  FOLLOW ME IN THESE PLACES FOR UPDATES Twitter -  Facebook -  Instagram -  Google Plus -
